verses.verse: He that dwells <S%H3427><s%> in the secret <S%H5643><s%> place of the most High <S%H5945><s%> shall stay <S%H3885><s%> under the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of the Almighty <S%H7706><s%>.
I will say <S%H559><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, He is my refuge <S%H4268><s%> and my fortress <S%H4686><s%>: my God <S%H430><s%>; in him will I trust <S%H982><s%>.
Surely he shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> you from the snare <S%H6341><s%> of the fowler <S%H3353><s%>, and from the deadly <S%H1942><s%> pestilence <S%H1698><s%>.

He shall cover <S%H5526><s%> you with his feathers <S%H84><s%>, and under his wings <S%H3671><s%> shall you trust <S%H2620><s%>: his truth <S%H571><s%> shall be your shield <S%H6793><s%> and shield <S%H5507><s%>.
You shall not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> for the terror <S%H6343><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>; nor for the arrow <S%H2671><s%> that flies <S%H5774><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%>;
Nor for the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> that walks <S%H1980><s%> in darkness <S%H652><s%>; nor for the destruction <S%H6986><s%> that wastes <S%H7736><s%> at noonday <S%H6672><s%>.
A thousand <S%H505><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> at your side <S%H6654><s%>, and ten thousand <S%H7233><s%> at your right hand <S%H3225><s%>; but it shall not come near you <S%H5066><s%>.
Only with your eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall you behold <S%H5027><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> the reward <S%H8011><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
Because you have made <S%H7760><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, which is my refuge <S%H4268><s%>, even the most High <S%H5945><s%>, your habitation <S%H4583><s%>;
There shall no evil <S%H7451><s%> happen to <S%H579><s%> you <S%H5061><s%>, neither shall any plague come near <S%H7126><s%> your living <S%H168><s%>.
For he shall give his angels <S%H4397><s%> charge <S%H6680><s%> over you <S%H8104><s%>, to keep you in all your ways <S%H1870><s%>.
They shall carry you up <S%H5375><s%> in their hands <S%H3709><s%>, lest you dash <S%H5062><s%> your foot <S%H7272><s%> against a stone <S%H68><s%>.
You shall tread <S%H1869><s%> upon the lion <S%H7826><s%> and adder <S%H6620><s%>: the young lion <S%H3715><s%> and the dragon <S%H8577><s%> shall you trample under feet <S%H7429><s%>.
Because he has set his love <S%H2836><s%> upon me <S%H6403><s%>, therefore will I deliver him <S%H7682><s%>: I will set him on high, because he has known <S%H3045><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%>.
He shall call <S%H7121><s%> upon me <S%H6030><s%>, and I will answer him <S%H6869><s%>: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver <S%H2502><s%> him <S%H3513><s%>, and honor him.
With long <S%H753><s%> life <S%H3117><s%> will I satisfy <S%H7646><s%> him <S%H7200><s%>, and show him my salvation <S%H3444><s%>.
